name: The Cozy Pub
description:
You are hanging out at the pub being all cozy when suddenly enemies attack! Help defend the pub from the endless wave of enemies that threaten it! 

The Cozy Pub is our entry for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam (2022). The game was completed in less than two weeks!

Gameplay

The game has two phases. The non combat and combat phase. During the non combat phase, you can talk to characters to learn more about what is going on. During the combat phase you must fight enemies and survive for a certain amount of time. The game then cycles back between two phases, with each combat phase becoming harder and harder. See how long you can survive! 

Controls

The Cozy Pub is a point and click action game. Left click to move around, talk to characters or attack enemies. There are no other controls at this time!

Credits

  • Alex Timbro - Core Programming and Graphic Rendering
  • Sunflyer Audio - Music, Sound Effects and Sound Design
